Ok so I have read through all the Wiki pages but still have a 
question on when to use POST vs. PUT.  I am going to post a few 
scenerios and what I think the correct behavior should be and would 
like some help on whether or not I am understanding things correctly.

Lets say I have an address book which contains contacts stored using 
a server defined ID.  Each contact contains a name, phone number and 
email address.

Adding a new contact (I belive this is correct):

POST new contact to /addressbook, server returns 201 along with the 
URI of the new contact.

Modify a contact (This is where I need help):

I want to modify only the name for the resource located 
at /addressbook/000001, do I POST the changes to the name or do I 
PUT them.  Also, do I need to PUT the entire record or just the 
changes?

Thanks for the help,

Josh
